author: Graham Rapier
title: NYC subway ridership cratered 93% as all but essential workers stay home — and the transit system says it needs an additional $3.9 billion bailout to keep running
description: Subway ridership in New York City is currently at less than 10% of its usual numbers. The agency responsible for public transit says it needs another federal bailout to make up for lost revenue. Visit Business Insider's homepage for more stories. The agency r…
content:
The agency responsible for public transit in New York City says the $3.8 billion federal government bailout it received in March won't be enough in the face of plummeting ridership.
Daily commutes on the subway, easily the nation's busiest public transportat… [+2448 chars]
